name: Frontend Post Submission Manager Lite – Frontend Posting WordPress Plugin
author: WP Shuffle

sections.description:
Frontend Post Submission Manager Lite is a free, powerful and user-friendly Frontend Posting WordPress plugin designed to simplify the process of submitting posts directly from the frontend of your website. Whether your users are logged in or not, this plugin empowers them to create and submit posts effortlessly, enhancing user engagement and content generation on your site.

You can configure available forms with drag and drop form builder, add unlimited custom fields with various field type supports.

Frontend Post Submission Manager Lite Features

📋 Guest Post Form and Login Required Form with Drag and Drop Form Builder
Create custom submission forms effortlessly using a user-friendly drag-and-drop builder.

🛠️ Unlimited Custom Fields with Various Types
Collect diverse data with unlimited custom fields and various field types.

👁️‍🗨️ Frontend and Backend Display
View custom field data both on the frontend and backend for easy access.

🖌️ 5 Beautiful Pre-Designed Templates
Choose from five visually appealing templates to enhance form aesthetics.

🌐 Guest Post Support
Encourage guest contributors to submit content and expand engagement.

🔒 Secure Form Submission with Google Captcha
Protect your site from spam with secure Google Captcha integration.

📧 Admin and User Notification Configurations
Customize notifications for admin and users to stay informed.

👁️‍🗨️ Frontend Form Preview
Enable users to preview form entries before submission.

🔀 Redirection after Successful Submission
Redirect users to specific pages post-submission for a seamless experience.

📈 Configure Submitted Post Status
Customize post status, author, and format to align with your strategy.

🔢 Character Limit Configuration
Set character limits for content submissions.

✅ Enable/Disable Form Components
Tailor the form by enabling or disabling specific components.

🔄 Ajax Form Submission
Ensure real-time submissions with smooth Ajax form functionality.

💼 Developer Documentation Available
Access developer documentation for customizing the plugin.

📱 All Device-Friendly and Browser Compatibility
Optimized for all devices and browsers for universal accessibility.

🌐 Translation Ready
Expand your reach with translation-ready features for global audiences.

Check Frontend Post Submission Manager Features

  • Create Unlimited Forms with different Restrictions
  • 20+ Pre Designed Beautiful Form Templates
  • Custom field with various field types
    • Textfield
    • Textarea
    • Select Dropdown
    • Checkbox
    • Radio Button
    • Number
    • Email
    • Datepicker
    • File Uploader
    • URL
    • Tel
    • Youtube Embed
  • Custom Post Types Support
  • Custom Taxonomies Support
  • Frontend Post Management Dashboard
  • Direct Image upload to Post Content Editor with or without logging in

Check all Frontend Post Submission Manager premium features here

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/frontend-post-submission-manager-lite directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Do the necessary configuration of the available forms from the Frontend Post Submission admin menu
sections.faq:
What does Frontend Post Submission Manager Lite Does?

Our plugin provides you the form which you can use in the frontend through shortcode for Post Submission with or without logging in.

Can I submit the post without login?

Yes, you can use our plugin for both Login and Without Login require forms.

Can I add custom fields?

Yes you can add unlimited custom fields.

Do I need to design the form?

No you won’t need to design the forms because we have 5 pre designed form templates
